# Import of the libraries and data

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- readRDS("data/df_logit.rds")
```

# Default

```{r}
counts <- table(data$default)
barplot(counts,
        main = "Distribution de la variable default",
        xlab = "Default (0 = non, 1 = oui)",
        ylab = "Nombre d'observations",
        col = c("skyblue", "tomato"),
        border = "white")
```
